We believe technology should empower

At Mr.Dev, we are driven by the desire to create technology that empowers individuals and businesses. We understand the ever-evolving digital landscape and strive to be at the forefront, providing cutting-edge solutions tailored to your specific needs. We collaborate closely with our clients to translate their vision into reality, ensuring their success is our top priority.

Our Story

About Us

Mr.Dev: Building the future, one line of code at a time.

Mr.Dev is a passionate tech startup specializing in crafting innovative mobile and web applications. We leverage the power of Flutter for seamless mobile experiences and Laravel for robust web solutions. Our team of skilled developers is dedicated to transforming your ideas into powerful tools that solve real-world problems.

Select Your Optimal Plan with MrDev

At MrDev, we recognize that every business has unique requirements. That’s why we offer a variety of flexible plans, designed to support your specific needs, whether you’re looking for routine maintenance, regular updates, or full-scale development services. Each plan is carefully structured to deliver exceptional value while upholding the highest standards of quality, security, and data protection.

Explore our plans below to find the one that aligns with your business goals. We’re committed to providing continuous support, ensuring your technology runs seamlessly, securely, and efficiently.

Standard Plan

Features

  • Basic maintenance (bug fixes and small issue resolution).
  • Monthly performance monitoring (server uptime, app performance, etc.).
  • Compatibility updates for new iOS/Android OS versions.
  • Up to 3 app submissions per year (Apple App Store & Google Play).
  • 10 support hours annually for minor updates or changes.
Contact us

Premium Plan

Features

  • Bi-weekly performance reports and analytics on backend and app performance.
  • Up to 6 app submissions per year.
  • 30 support hours annually for advanced updates or changes.
  • Proactive bug fixing with monthly app health check-ins.
  • Minor UI enhancements (excluding full redesigns).
Contact us

Enterprise Plan

Features

  • Unlimited app submissions (Apple App Store & Google Play).
  • 80 support hours annually for significant feature updates or development.
  • Monthly consultations with our development team for roadmap planning and feature implementation.
  • Full monitoring and proactive maintenance with an immediate response to critical issues.
  • Priority support (24/7 for critical issues).
  • Backend scaling and optimization to accommodate high traffic or new feature rollouts.
Contact us
